title: Jordan Peele & NOPE Cast | Jan. 6 Committee Reveals Trump's Actions Behind the Scenes During Coup: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the January 6 committee revealing a series of depositions from former aides to Trump and the Secret Service mysteriously deleting text messages from the day of the coup attempt despite requests from Congress to preserve records.

Then, Daniel Kaluuya, Keke Palmer, Brandon Perea and Jordan Peele talk about watching Nope for the first time at the film's premiere, the process of acting with things that are not there and discuss how they landed their roles in the film.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
